abstract: Demonstrators in Yemen's capital Sana escalate their protest by marching into government-held territory for second consecutive day; are fired on by pro-government forces, leaving five people dead; Pres Ali Abdullah Saleh, who has rebuffed pressure to step down, lashes out at Western governments in televised speech.
snippet: At least five people were killed as demonstrators again marched into government territory in the capital, Sana.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: At least five people were killed as demonstrators again marched into government territory in the capital, Sana.

headline.main: As Yemeni Revolt Escalates, Pro-Government Forces Fire on Protesters for a Second Day
headline.print_headline: As Yemeni Revolt Escalates, Pro-Government Forces Fire on Protesters for a Second Day
headline.seo: Yemeni Forces Fire on Protesters for Second Day
